- name:

  url:
  feed:

  status: # One of: playable, semi-playable, unplayable
  multiplayer:
  - see: https://github.com/opengaming/osgameclones/blob/master/schema/games.yaml#L37

  - # e.g. C++, JavaScript

  - # e.g. Unity, SDL2
  license: # see: https://github.com/opengaming/osgameclones/blob/master/schema/games.yaml#L72

  info:
  updated: # insert current date as YYYY-MM-DD
  images:

  video:
